main.name: Joshua Park
main.bio: I am a soon to be graduate from Syracuse University with a B.S. in Computer Science. I am looking for a position in software development to utilize my relevant experience and problem solving skills

description: College of Engineering and Computer Science

Core Classes Taken: Design of Operating Systems, Software Specification/Implementation, Evolutionary Machine Learning, Social Media & Data Mining, Intro to Cryptography, Access Control, Security, & Trust, and Web System Architecture

work.title: Software Engineer - Contractor
description: Analyze information to determine, recommend, and plan installation of a new system or modification of an existing system
Analyze needs and software requirements to determine the feasibility of design within summer time constraint
Create an inventory system that would communicate with different services already being utilized to streamline the business flow

work.company: Syracuse University, College of Engineering and Computer Science
work.title: ECS REU Summer Intern
description: Assist Dr. Steve Chapin in developing a prototype implementation of an Electric Vehicle Charging Negotiation Platform
Analyze and interpret quantitative and qualitative results
Prepare reports consisting of progress and final product to be presented to the ECS REU program
Develop a protocol for the exchange of electrical power between the electrical grid and electric vehicles

work.title: High School Researcher
description: Assist Dr. Sanza Kazadi in utilizing swarm design methodology to develop classes of swarm solutions to specific specifications
Lead a team of high school students in developing and collecting quantitative data on simulations of swarm classes
Prepare a research paper and poster to publish/present at ICAART 2017
Research Paper Title: Generating Swarm Solution Classes using the Hamiltonian Method of Swarm Design
